attributes.action: look at ways of reducing travel expenses for FCO staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK Foreign Office staff abroad are entitled to flights home every year as well as at the beginning and end of their posting. They can fly business class if their embassy is more than three hours from London by plane. Foreign Office staff should only be allowed to fly business class if the flight time is more than 6 hours from London.
